casebody.data:
Wilkes
v.
City of Greenville 368PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2016

Ms. Anita B. Hunt, Attorney at Law, For Wilkes, Johnnie.

Mr. Matthew P. Blake, Attorney at Law, For City of Greenville, et al.

Mr. J. William Crone, IV, Attorney at Law, Mr. J. Timothy Wilson, Attorney at Law, Mr. Bruce A. Hamilton, Attorney at Law, Ms. Tracey L. Jones, Attorney at Law, Ms. Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy, Ms. Christine Teresa Scheef, Attorney at Law, Ms. Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, Mr. M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Ms. Angela Farag Craddock, Attorney at Law, For N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al.

Ms. Kathleen G. Sumner, Attorney at Law, For Workers' Injury Law & Advocacy Group.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of June 2016 by Workers Injury Law & Advocacy Group for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
